title: Climbing an irregular set of stairs is more dif...

content.prompt: Climbing an irregular set of stairs is more difficult for an individual who wears a patch over one eye primarily because

choices.label: half of the visual field is missing
the ability to perceive interposition is lost
the patch disrupts the functioning of the vestibular system

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
